contactDetails.title: Contact Details
contactDetails.description: Complete the details for the relevant parties

legalRepresentative.title: Legal Representative of one of the above

noticeOfAssignmentAndCharge.title: Who accepts service of the Notice of Assignment & Charge?
noticeOfAssignmentAndCharge.description: Tick the box beside each applicable party and state the total fee including VAT for notice of assignment and charge. Tick 'Notice via email' to confirm whether you will accept notice via email

collectsbuildingInsurancePremiums.title: Who collects the building insurance premiums?

dealsWithDayToDayMaintenanceOfManagedAre.title: Who deals with the day to day maintenance of the Managed Area?

organisesBuildingInsurance.title: Who organises and administers the buildings insurance?

dealsWithDayToDayMaintenanceOfBuilding.title: Who deals with the day to day maintenance of the building?

lesseeInCharge.title: Please provide contact details of the Lessee in charge

deedOfCovenantRequired.title: Is a Deed of Covenant Required?

costsApplicableToTheDeed.title: Confirm the costs applicable to the Deed including VAT

personWhoDealsWithTheDeedOfCovenant.title: Provide details of the person who deals with the Deed of Covenant

licenceToAssignRequired.title: Is a License to Assign required?

requirements.title: Specify requirements e.g. references, and any costs applicable to the Licence

awareOfConsents.title: Are you aware of consent having been given to any alterations or additions to the Property?

details.title: Provide details and copies of any consent

requirementsToBeMemberOfManagementCompan.title: Is the incoming Lessee required to take a share in, or Yes become a member of, the Management Company?

details.title: Provide details of the procedures and fees. Include details of the person who deals with the new certificate or share.

procedureForObtainingCertificate.title: What is the procedure and cost for obtaining a certificate in accordance with a restriction in the Proprietorship Register at the Land Registry, if applicable?

groundRentPayable.title: What is the annual Ground Rent payable for the Property?

groundRentPaidUpToDate.title: Is the Ground Rent paid up to date?

lastDemandPeriod.title: What period is covered by the last demand?

propertiesContributingToMaintenaceOfMana.title: How many properties contribute toward the maintenance of the Managed Area?

serviceChargePayable.title: What is the current annual Service Charge for the £ Property?

adHocExpenses.title: If the Service Charge has been collected on an 'ad hoc' basis, what have been the expenses over the last 3 years?

serviceChargePaidUpToDate.title: Is the Service Charge paid up to date for the Property?

excessPaymentAnticipated.title: Is any excess payment anticipated for the Property at the Yes end of the financial year?

lastDemandPeriod.title: What period is covered by the last demand?

hasInabilityToCollectAffectedMaintenance.title: In the last 12 months, has any inability to collect payments, from any party, affected (or is it likely to Yes affect), the maintenance of the Managed Area?

reserveFund.title: Does a Reserve Fund apply to the Managed Area?

sufficentToCoverSection20Expenditure.title: Is the amount expected to be sufficient to cover the known Section 20 expenditure?

lastDecoratedPeriod.title: Confirm the date when the Managed Areas were last decorated, internally and externally.

section20WorksProposed.title: Within the next 2 years, are any Section 20 works proposed to the Property?

details.title: If so, provide details of the works and the contribution anticipated from the Lessee

increaseInServiceChargeAnticipated.title: Is any increase in the Service Charge over 10% or £100, whichever is the greater, anticipated in the next 2 years?

outstandingServiceChargeConsultation.title: Are there any outstanding Service Charge consultation procedures?

japaneseKnotweedAffectingManagedAreas.title: Are the Managed Areas known to be affected by Japanese knotweed?

details.title: Provide details and a copy of any Japanese knotweed management plan in place.

transferFees.title: Are there any transfer fees deferred service charges or similar fees, expressed as a percentage of the Property's value, payable on an event such as resale or subletting?

allPropertiesContribute.title: Do all properties in the Managed Area contribute to the Service Charge?

deedOfCertificateServed.title: Has a Leaseholder Deed of Certificate been served on the Landlord in relation to the property or remedial works required to the property?

landlordsCertificateServed.title: Has a Landlord's Certificate been served?

premiumsPaidUpToDate.title: Are the buildings insurance premium contributions paid up to date for the Managed Areas including the Property?

lastDemandPeriod.title: What period is covered by the last demand?

premiumPaidinFull.title: Has the premium been paid in full?

claimsMade.title: Have any claims been made against the policy during Yes the last 3 years?

managedAreasCoveredByPolicy.title: Are the Managed Areas covered by the policy?

riskAssessments.title: Whas risk assessments have been completed?

urgentWorksRecommended.title: Have urgent or essential works been recommended?

outstandingEnforcementAction.title: Is there any outstanding enforcement action Yes against the landlord or accountable person (such as outstanding enforcement notices)?

dateRemedialActionRequired.title: By what date is remedial action required?

standardTermsAvailable.title: Are you aware of any reason why comprehensive insurance will not be available on standard terms in future?

nonComplianceWithConditions.title: Are you aware of any non-compliance with the insurance conditions that would render the policy void?

buildingsReinstatementCostAssessment.title: Please confirm the date of the last buildings reinstatement/cost assessment.

premiumIncludedInServiceCharge.title: Is the insurance premium included in the service charge Yes budget?

details.title: confirm the annual amount payable for the Property

ongoingForfeitureProceedings.title: Are there any on-going forfeiture proceedings in relation to the Property?

unresolvedDisputes.title: Are there any documented unresolved disputes with the Yes Lessees of any of the properties in the Managed Area?

details.title: To the extent permitted by the UK General Data Protection Regulations, please supply details

enfranchisementSteps.title: Have any steps been taken by anyone to enfranchise, exercise the right to manage, form a right to enfranchise or management company, extend the term of the lease of the Property or anything similar?

details.title: Provide details and copies of relevant documentation

breachOfTermsOfLease.title: Are you aware of any breach of the terms of the lease of this Property?

otherPropertiesInManagedArea.title: How many other properties are there in the Managed Area?

leasedOnSimilarTerms.title: Are they all leased on leases with similar terms?

buildingKnownToBeHMO.title: Is the building in which the Property is situated known to be an HMO?

details.title: Confirm that regulations applicable to section 257 Housing Act 2004 HMOs have been complied with

additionalParkingRegulations.title: Are there any parking regulations or restrictions in addition to any set out in the lease?

restrictionOnKeepingPets.title: Is there a restriction in the lease on keeping pets?

requiredDocuments.title: Required Documents
requiredDocuments.description: Please provide the following applicable documents:

serviceChargeAccounts.title: The last 3 years published Service Charge accounts.

managedAreasBuildingsInsurancePolicy.title: Buildings insurance policy and schedule for the Managed Areas.

serviceChargeEstimatesCurrent.title: Service charge estimate for the current year and details of the anticipated payments on account for the Property.

serviceChargeEstimatesPrevious.title: Service charge estimate for the previous year for which accounts have not yet been prepared for the Property.

proposedWorksNotices.title: Copies of any notices served on the Lessees under Section 20 in respect of any proposed works or any works which have not yet been paid for.

forfeitureDocumentation.title: Documentation relating to any forfeiture proceedings applicable to the Property.

additionalRegulationsNotInLease.title: Any additional regulations or rules affecting the Property which are not contained in the lease.

deedsOfVariation.title: Any Deeds of Variation or other document varying the terms of the lease of this Property.

permissionToAlter.title: Copy of any permission to alter the Property which has been issued.

noticesServedOnLessee.title: Copy of any known notices served on the Lessee and documentation arising from them.

asbestosSurvey.title: Asbestos Survey for parts of the Managed Area built or converted before 2001.

managedAreaFireRiskAssessment.title: Fire Risk Assessment for the Managed Area.

memorandumAndArticles.title: Memorandum and Articles of Association of the Management Company.

managementCompanyAGMMinutes.title: Minutes from the last AGM for the Management Company.

enforcementNotices.title: Known enforcement notices served on the landlord or accountable person (where the building is residential and is at least 18 meters or 7 storeys).

confirmation.title: Confirmation
confirmation.description: By checking the box you are .

response.title: Declaration
response.description: I/we confirm that I am the person authorised to provide the information which I have completed in it on behalf of those parties which I have selected from the list, and that a buyer may rely on the information which I have supplied without applying to any other party except where I have left a section blank because I do not have the authority to provide the information

capacity.title: Confirm the capacity in which the answers are given.
